name: Lysto AI
headline: Task automation platform for GTM teams
description: Lysto is a task automation platform built for go-to-market (GTM) teams, designed to streamline workflows and reduce time spent on administrative tasks. By aggregating data from your video calls, emails, and other data sources like internal documents and product analytics, Lysto automates key GTM tasks such as updating CRM records, drafting personalized follow-up emails, and logging customer issues in tools like Slack or JIRA. Each task can be fully automated or flagged for final review in Lysto’s task inbox, providing both efficiency and oversight.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:b2b; industry:workflow-automation; industry:customer-success; industry:sales; location:new-york

founders.name: Kyle Archie, Founder
founders.description: CEO of Lysto AI. Previously worked at Meta on early LLM product research (2019-2020), Conversational AI Voice Interfaces (2021-2022), and started IMU Gestural Interface product group (2022-2023) for Meta Smart Glasses. Prior to Meta, led Product at Tripod AI, processing 500+ images/second using 20+ ML models for brands including Flickr, Yahoo and Verizon. Holds two patents in Conversational AI. BS in Computer Science from Stanford University.

founders.name: Manuel Diaz-Granados, Founder
founders.description: CTO of Lysto AI. Previously led Ads Web Team at Rokt (Series D startup), developing ML pipeline integrations that optimized 100M+ in ad traffic. Prior to Rokt, led Enrichment Team at Tripod AI, processing 500+ images/second using 20+ ML models for brands including Flickr, Yahoo and Verizon. Master's in ECE from Carnegie Mellon with publications in cloud computing, big data, and computer vision.

# Do more. Type less.
Exceed expectations with the world's first task automation platform for GTM teams.
Exceed expectations with the world's first task automation platform for GTM teams.
[ Book a Demo ](https://lysto.ai/<https:/calendar.app.google/Jzs2bPbzsQqtFPe97>) [ Learn more ](https://lysto.ai/<#grid-section>)
![Full Width Large Image](https://lysto.ai/vid-img.png)
## Supercharge Your Pipeline with Next-Gen AI
Lysto takes care of everything from real-time meeting insights to automating complex workflows.
![Record Card](https://lysto.ai/Record_Card.svg)
## Effortless Meeting Intelligence
Record and capture detailed notes, action items, and key topics from every meeting automatically.
![Hubspot](https://lysto.ai/Calendar.svg)
![Hubspot](https://lysto.ai/Contacts.svg)
![Hubspot](https://lysto.ai/Email.svg)
## Deal 360°
Let AI aggregate your emails, calls, CRM updates, and usage data to give you a complete view of your deals.
![Deal Card](https://lysto.ai/Deal_Card.svg)
![Hubspot](https://lysto.ai/Hubspot.svg)
![Jira](https://lysto.ai/Jira.svg)
![Salesforce](https://lysto.ai/Salesforce.svg)
## Workflows
Combine triggers, customer data, and multiple software integrations into automated tasks that keep your team aligned and efficient.
![Workflow Card](https://lysto.ai/Workflow_Card.svg)
## Automation That Works for You
Decide which tasks to automate or review, ensuring you spend less time on repetitive actions and more time closing deals.
![Automate Card](https://lysto.ai/Automate_Card.svg)
## Meet Leo: Your AI Companion for GTM Success
Ask questions, get insights, and complete tasks instantly. Leo transforms your sales data into actionable intelligence.
  * "What were the top 3 concerns from existing customers this month?” 
  * "Which sales rep has the fastest average response time to leads this quarter?" 
  * "What's the current pipeline value for our enterprise segment?" 
  * "Which features are most requested by our top-tier customers?" 


![Chat Card](https://lysto.ai/Chat_Card.svg)
## Unify Your GTM Stack with Seamless Integrations
Streamline your workflow with Lysto’s integrations with tools for communication, analytics, productivity, and project management—all in one place.
![amplitude](https://lysto.ai/amplitude.svg)
![asana](https://lysto.ai/asana.svg)
![Gmail](https://lysto.ai/Gmail.svg)
![Google Calendar](https://lysto.ai/Google_Calendar.svg)
![Google Drive](https://lysto.ai/Google_Drive.svg)
![google-analytics](https://lysto.ai/google-analytics.svg)
![google-docs](https://lysto.ai/google-docs.svg)
![google-meet](https://lysto.ai/google-meet.svg)
![hubspot color](https://lysto.ai/hubspot_color.svg)
![jira color](https://lysto.ai/jira_color.svg)
![Notion](https://lysto.ai/Notion.svg)
![Google Calendar](https://lysto.ai/Google_Calendar.svg)
![Outlook](https://lysto.ai/Outlook.svg)
![posthog](https://lysto.ai/posthog.svg)
![Salesforce color](https://lysto.ai/Salesforce_color.svg)
![Slack](https://lysto.ai/Slack.svg)
![Teams](https://lysto.ai/Teams.svg)
![zapier](https://lysto.ai/zapier.svg)
![zoom](https://lysto.ai/zoom.svg)
## Endless Ways to Streamline and Scale
From data syncing to task automation, Lysto transforms your GTM workflows, delivering powerful efficiency across all your tools
![Hubspot](https://lysto.ai/hubspot_color.svg)
Automatically update CRM records with the most recent customer interaction information, without the need for manual entry.
![Jira](https://lysto.ai/jira_color.svg)
Create and update bug tickets based on customer conversations, ensuring technical issues are promptly logged and addressed.
![Amplitude](https://lysto.ai/amplitude.svg)
Analyze customer interaction data and update retention indicators, allowing the CS team to take proactive measures.
![Asana](https://lysto.ai/asana.svg)
Automatically sync project statuses with customer information, facilitating accurate and timely updates.
![Gmail](https://lysto.ai/Gmail.svg)
Draft personalized responses to customer questions based on interaction history and product information.
![Slack](https://lysto.ai/Slack.svg)
Automatically share recording links from sales calls in the designated channel, enhancing team collaboration and follow-up.
![Lysto Logo](https://lysto.ai/lysto-logo.svg)
[ ](https://lysto.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/lystoai>)

generated_description:
**Lysto AI: Automating Success for Go-To-Market Teams**

Founded in 2023 and based in New York, Lysto AI is a groundbreaking task automation platform specifically designed for go-to-market (GTM) teams. As part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Lysto aims to simplify and enhance the workflows of sales and customer success teams by reducing the time spent on administrative tasks.

**What Does Lysto Do?**

At its core, Lysto AI aggregates data from various sources—everything from video calls to emails, CRM updates, and internal documents. The platform automates a variety of essential tasks, including:
- Updating CRM records,
- Drafting personalized follow-up emails,
- Logging customer issues in tools like Slack and JIRA.

You have the flexibility to fully automate these tasks or review them before finalization, thanks to Lysto’s intuitive task inbox.

**Key Features:**
- **Meeting Intelligence:** Automatically records detailed notes and action items from meetings.
- **Deal 360°:** Aggregates data from emails, calls, and CRM updates to give a comprehensive view of your deals.
- **Custom Workflows:** Combines triggers, customer data, and software integrations into seamless automated tasks.
- **AI Companion - Leo:** A smart assistant that transforms sales data into actionable insights, allowing users to ask specific questions about customer interactions and sales performance.

**Integrations Galore:**
Lysto seamlessly integrates with a wide range of tools that teams already use, including HubSpot, Salesforce, Slack, Jira, and Google Drive, enabling smooth data synchronization and improved productivity across the board.

**Conclusion:**
With just a team of two, Dalton Caldwell as their Group Partner, and backed by the prestige of Y Combinator, Lysto AI is poised to redefine task automation for GTM teams. Their mantra, “Do more, type less,” encapsulates their commitment to enhancing efficiency in sales and customer success operations. 

For more information, you can visit their website at [lysto.ai](https://lysto.ai) or book a demo to see Lysto AI in action.
